gov.usgs.alarm

Class SendEventRelay

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.alarm.SendEventRelay

  • public final class SendEventRelay
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will relay UDP alarm packets to another alarm server. It is entirely static.

    • Method Detail

      • setEventHandler

        public static void setEventHandler(java.lang.String ip,
                                   int port,
                                   int bindport)
        override the IP address to which Events are sent
        Parameters:
        ip - The IP address to use for events , if null do not change
        port - The port to use (if <= 0, do not change)
        bindport - If this end needs to bind its port, set the binding..

      • sendEvent

        public static void sendEvent(java.lang.String src,
                             java.lang.String cd,
                             java.lang.String payload,
                             java.lang.String node,
                             java.lang.String process)
        send a UDP packet with an event the current eventHandler IP and port
        Parameters:
        src - The 12 character source
        cd - The 12 character error code
        payload - Up to 80 characters of message payload
        node - Up to 12 character computer node name
        process - Up to 12 character process name
